mapper.sql: my_file.my_file_id as my_file_my_file_id, my_file.my_file_name as my_file_my_file_name, my_file.download_time as my_file_download_time, my_file.upload_time as my_file_upload_time, my_file.`size` as `my_file_size`, my_file.`type` as `my_file_type`, my_file.`postfix` as `my_file_postfix`, my_file.file_folder_id as my_file_file_folder_id, my_file.my_file_path as my_file_my_file_path
mapper.insert: insert into my_file (my_file_name, download_time, upload_time, `size`, `type`, `postfix`, file_folder_id, my_file_path) values (#{myFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{downloadTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFolderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{myFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update my_file
my_file_name = #{myFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
download_time = #{downloadTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`size` = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`postfix` = #{postfix,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_folder_id = #{fileFolderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
my_file_path = #{myFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where my_file_id = #{myFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
